Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory60.jpg'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: "It is a rainy night. The city looks like a wet castle made from mud under the street lamp's yellow light."}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You are standing in a deserted graveyard located on the outskirts of this damningly corrupted city.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You are standing around the most unremarkable grave stone, waiting with your hands together.'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Why is he still following us?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Look, there's something written on his body...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'This camp assistant is specifically designed for students who are not combat trained, so they could focus on experiencing the story...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'What are we waiting for?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Why is the city corrupt?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'What does he mean by "hands together"?', 4: '3'}
{3: 'The narrator never answers, as if he does not care at all.'}
{3: 'It is only then that the Constructs realize they are floating half a meter above the ground. They cannot move.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "We can't move... This is a completely unknown technology...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'It is capable of cutting the link between us and reality to create this effect on the consciousness level. When we are out, I must break this record apart to study it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Anyway, you are all waiting.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Waiting for your master to wake up...'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Wait... Has anyone of you seen Commandant?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Now that you mention it...', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Meanwhile, you are lying inside a dark, wet, and putrid coffin.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Rainwater falls into your mouth through soil and two layers of rotten wood. It tastes so foul that you would definitely vomit if you could move.'}
{2: 'Where am I?', 3: '29', 4: 'Why is this happening to me?', 5: '30'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: "Inside a coffin. You're dead... for now."}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Oh, you were murdered by the local gang as you messed with their business.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: "But it won't last too long. Your eyes are wide open, and your blood has started to flow again, slow like petroleum."}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Your muscles are getting strong. You feel your body is returning back to your control.'}
{2: '(Push the coffin open)', 3: '34', 4: '(Keep waiting)', 5: '36'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Oh, no. Please, just be a little more patient. You are obviously not in your best form yet.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Your effort was wasted. You only managed to move the lid slightly. Some foil falls on your face.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You continue to wait, until your muscles return to their power. Now you have enough strength.'}
{2: '(Push the coffin open)', 3: '38'}
{3: 'You push with all your strength. The lid makes a disturbing squeak between your hands and the soil covering it.'}
{3: 'And then you see lightâ€”the dim, yellow light from the street lamps shines right on your face.'}
{3: 'The Constructs are floating above you. They look worried.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Seeing their master has awakened, the natural spirits can wait no longer. They start to move.'}
{3: 'The Constructs rush over to dig you out of the grave.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'Unfortunately, your resurrection was witnessed by the gravekeeper, who happened to work for that local gang.'}
{2: 'Narration', 3: 'You better leave before he calls for more gangsters.'}
